name: Executive Chair
description: Featuring a spacious and ergonomic design, this executive chair is perfect for any office. With a sturdy and durable frame, this chair is built to last. The padded, armless design offers a sleek look and comfortable feel.

name: Executive Table
description: The Executive Table is a great way to upgrade your office with a sleek and modern design. It is constructed with durable materials and has a stylish silver finish. This table is also a good size for any office, providing enough space for four people to work.

name: Morris-287 Sofa
description: The Morris-287 Sofa is the perfect choice for any living room, den, or even a home office. The soft and plush sofa is perfect for lounging or napping. You can even stretch out on the long length of the sofa and curl up with a good book.

name: Eppiphany-115 Bed
description: This bed is a place of tranquility. The bed is made of sturdy pine wood and has a calming color palette of white and black. The mattress is a standard size, and the headboard has a built-in reading light.

name: Proto-150 Dressing Table
description: The Proto-150 Dressing Table is a simple yet sturdy piece of furniture that features a fold-down desk, perfect for applying makeup or doing homework. The desk has a deep shelf for storage and is finished with a durable and beautiful cherry wood veneer.

name: Carlson-164 Almirah
description: The Carlson-164 Almirah is a highly-functional storage unit that can hold a large amount of clothing and other items. It has two shelves and three drawers that can hold a variety of items.
